body_html: Yep, that is true. And this is the only place in the codebase that is using constantize. When I fix this I will also run brakeman to check if it finds other problems just to be on the safe side.
body_text: Yep, that is true. And this is the only place in the codebase that is using constantize. When I fix this I will also run brakeman to check if it finds other problems just to be on the safe side.
body: Yep, that is true. And this is the only place in the codebase that is using `constantize`. When I fix this I will also run brakeman to check if it finds other problems just to be on the safe side.
